english.segment1: Hey yeah, hey hey. Just tell me, what's the difference thats between. Being myself and being. Oh So.. Together with my thoughts I'll.. I'll cut and stab and make my.. I'll cut and stab and make my.. Example
english.segment2: For those about to tell me to, I'll never listen to you
english.segment3: I'll never go, I don't wanna know (I don't need to know). Why won't you stay, your so far away (I don't need to)
english.segment4: This is the part where you take, You take your place and I just.. Just take mine. I've never been so sick of.. So sick of seeing you so.. You so blind
english.segment5: All of these things you offer to, The ones who forget you
english.segment6: I'll never go, I don't wanna know (I don't need to know). Why won't you stay, your so far away (I don't need to)
english.segment7: I'll get you back, cause I've been known for, Seeking my, for getting my, for stealing my revenge
